name: Cardiology Preventive Screening Package
description: Comprehensive cardiovascular screening protocols for primary and secondary prevention with risk-stratified variants

screening_types.name: Lipid Panel
screening_types.description: Standard cholesterol and lipid screening for cardiovascular risk assessment

screening_types.name: Lipid Panel - High Risk
screening_types.description: Frequent lipid monitoring for high cardiovascular risk patients

screening_types.name: Blood Pressure Monitoring
screening_types.description: Standard blood pressure screening for hypertension detection

screening_types.name: Blood Pressure Monitoring - Hypertensive
screening_types.description: Frequent blood pressure monitoring for diagnosed hypertensive patients

screening_types.name: Electrocardiogram (ECG) - High Risk
screening_types.description: Frequent ECG monitoring for high-risk cardiovascular patients

screening_types.name: Echocardiogram
screening_types.description: Cardiac ultrasound for structural heart assessment

screening_types.name: Echocardiogram - Heart Failure
screening_types.description: Regular echocardiogram monitoring for heart failure patients

screening_types.name: Stress Test
screening_types.description: Exercise or pharmacological stress testing for coronary assessment

screening_types.name: Coronary Artery Calcium Score
screening_types.description: CT calcium scoring for coronary atherosclerosis assessment

screening_types.name: Carotid Ultrasound
screening_types.description: Carotid artery ultrasound for stroke risk assessment

screening_types.name: BNP/NT-proBNP
screening_types.description: Brain natriuretic peptide testing for heart failure assessment
